name: Farm Defender (Lakea Games)
description:
Farm Defender the ultimate defender where all you have to do is DELAY THE INEVITABLE! Using your troops you will have to defend your castle that contain your precious farms. The farms give you the food that will enable you to place and upgrade your troops and the farms themselves. This allows farms to give you more food each cycle or to allow troops to do more damage and to upgrade there total health.

Enjoy playing!
